author: Lao Tzu
message: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; theres only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
message: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
title: Thought of the day

author: H. Bertram Lewis
message: The happy and efficient people in this world are those who accept trouble as a normal detail of human life and resolve to capitalize it when it comes along.
title: Thought of the day
